summary: Four boys have their friendship and musical talents tested in the ever changing worlds of the music industry and real life in 1990s Japan.
cast: Jin Akanishi|Kii Kitano|Kengo Kôra|Ayumi Itô|Yuki Shibamoto|Nobuaki Kaneko|Hideyuki Kasahara|Anne Watanabe|Hatsunori Hasegawa|Yoshiyuki Ishizuka|Mayu Kitaki|Yoshimasa Kondô|Yuki Saitô|Kazuo Zaitsu
title: Bandeiji
